entry.title: Debugging with Heroku
entry.content:
Install Heroku Toolbelt, and you should be able to run heroku from your command tool

{% codeblock %} $ heroku apps === My Apps xxx xxxx $ heroku open --app your-app-name Opening return-inventory... done $ heroku logs $ heroku run rake db:migrate --app return-inventory {% endcodeblock %}

Run rails with production settings in order to debug locally {% codeblock %} $ brew install memcached $ rails s -e production {% endcodeblock %}

{% codeblock %} RAILS_ENV=production rake db:migrate {% endcodeblock %}

/Applications/Postgres.app/Contents/MacOS/bin/createdb inventory_production
